original: Point Lookout Reborn is an overhaul mod designed to make Point Lookout more enjoyable, level friendly and mainly to make exploration more rewarding. This mod contains many lore friendly changes and improvements that fit in with Point Lookouts environment. Point Lookout Reborn is all about exploration. Those who take the time to explore the vast swampland will be rewarded with over 40% more additional content and around 2-3 hours of extended game play on top or the original 8 hours expected to complete ever
translation: 望海崖重生是一款旨在让望海崖更加有趣、等级更友好，并主要让探索更具回报性的大修模组。这个模组包含了许多与望海崖环境相契合的、符合游戏背景的改动和改进。\n\n望海崖重生全都是为了探索。那些花时间探索广阔沼泽地的人，将获得超过40%的额外内容和大约2到3小时的额外游戏时间，这将为原本预计8小时就能完成的游戏增加不少趣味。

original:
scn DLC04MotelGenerator2SCRIPT

short	Button
short	Fixed

short doOnce

Begin OnActivate

	if (doOnce == 0)
      
   if (DLC04ElectricBoxREF.getDestroyed == 0)

ShowMessage DLC04MotelGeneratorMsg

endif
END

BEGIN GameMode

MenuMode 1011

		set Button to GetButtonPressed

		; Player repairs the generator
		if ( Button == 1 )
                   set Fixed to 1
Player.removeitem SpareParts 2
Player.removeitem TinCan01 3
Player.removeitem FissionBattery 1
			ShowMessage DLC04FixedGeneratorMsg
			RewardXP 50
	          MotelLightingParentREF.Enable
;DLC04ExplodeBoxREF.Enable
;DLC04MotelElectricBoxREF.Disable
DLC04ElectricBoxREF.Disable

set doOnce to 1

endif
	endif
          END

short	Fixed

short doOnce

	if (doOnce == 0)
      
   if (DLC04ElectricBoxREF.getDestroyed == 0)

ShowMessage DLC04MotelGeneratorMsg

endif
END

BEGIN GameMode

MenuMode 1011

		set Button to GetButtonPressed

		; Player repairs the generator
		if ( Button == 1 )
                   set Fixed to 1
Player.removeitem 00031944 2
Player.removeitem 00022104 3
Player.removeitem 00033BC6 1
			ShowMessage DLC04FixedGeneratorMsg
			RewardXP 50
	          MotelLightingParentREF.Enable
;DLC04ExplodeBoxREF.Enable
;DLC04MotelElectricBoxREF.Disable
DLC04ElectricBoxREF.Disable

set doOnce to 1

endif
	endif
          END

original:
Scn DLC04MotelGeneratorScript

short	Button
short	Fixed

short doOnce

Begin OnActivate

	if (doOnce == 0)
      
   if (DLC04ElectricBoxREF.getDestroyed == 0)

SetStage DLC04MotelLighting 50
ShowMessage DLC04MotelGeneratorMsg

endif
END

BEGIN GameMode

MenuMode 1011

		set Button to GetButtonPressed

		; Player repairs the generator
		if ( Button == 1 )
                   set Fixed to 1
Player.removeitem SpareParts 2
Player.removeitem TinCan01 3
Player.removeitem FissionBattery 1
ShowMessage DLC04FixedGeneratorMsg
SetStage DLC04MotelLighting 100
DLC04ExplodingGeneratorREF.Enable
DLC04MotelMainElectricBoxREF.Disable
DLC04MotelGeneratorPartsREF.Enable

set doOnce to 1

endif
	endif
          END

short	Button
short	Fixed

short doOnce

Begin OnActivate

	if (doOnce == 0)
      
   if (DLC04ElectricBoxREF.getDestroyed == 0)

SetStage DLC04MotelLighting 50
ShowMessage DLC04MotelGeneratorMsg

endif
END

BEGIN GameMode

MenuMode 1011

		set Button to GetButtonPressed

		; Player repairs the generator
		if ( Button == 1 )
                   set Fixed to 1
Player.removeitem 00031944 2
Player.removeitem 00022104 3
Player.removeitem 00033BC6 1

SetStage DLC04MotelLighting 100
DLC04ExplodingGeneratorREF.Enable
DLC04MotelMainElectricBoxREF.Disable
DLC04MotelGeneratorPartsREF.Enable

set doOnce to 1

endif
	endif
          END

original:
scn DLC04BWSentryBotScript

short	Button
short	Fixed
short  doOnce
short  Disabled

Begin OnActivate

if doOnce == 0 && Disabled == 0

ShowMessage DLC04BWSentryBotRepairMessage

endif

if Disabled == 1

ShowMessage DLC04BWSentryBotDisabledMessage

Endif

END

BEGIN GameMode

MenuMode 1011

		set Button to GetButtonPressed

		; Player repairs the robot

                  if ( Button == 1 )
                   set Fixed to 1
			Player.removeitem Conductor 1
			Player.removeitem SpareParts 2
			Player.removeitem FissionBattery 2
			Player.removeitem WonderGlue 1
			DLC04BWSentrybot1REF.Resurrect
               DLC04BWSentrybot1REF.Modav Health 550
			ShowMessage DLC04BWSentryBotRepairedMessage
               RewardXP 35
			set doOnce to 1		;Trigger is only set off one time
			endif 	

				if ( Button == 2 )
			Player.additem SpareParts 3
			Player.additem FissionBattery 2		
			Player.additem AmmoMissile 4
			Player.additem AmmoElectronChargePack 150
			Set Disabled to 1
			set doOnce to 1		;Trigger is only set off one time	


            elseif ( Button == 0 )
	          ;Do nothing 

		
		endif

End

Begin OnCombatEnd

DLC04BWSentrybot1REF.ResetHealth

END
translation:
scn DLC04BWSentryBotScript

short	Button
short	Fixed
short  doOnce
short  Disabled

Begin OnActivate

if doOnce == 0 && Disabled == 0

ShowMessage DLC04BWSentryBotRepairMessage

endif

if Disabled == 1

ShowMessage DLC04BWSentryBotDisabledMessage

Endif

END

BEGIN GameMode

MenuMode 1011

		set Button to GetButtonPressed

		; Player repairs the robot

                  if ( Button == 1 )
                   set Fixed to 1
			Player.removeitem 00022102 1
			Player.removeitem 00031944 2
			Player.removeitem 00033BC6 2
			Player.removeitem 0002210A 1
			DLC04BWSentrybot1REF.Resurrect
               DLC04BWSentrybot1REF.Modav Health 550
			ShowMessage DLC04BWSentryBotRepairedMessage
               RewardXP 35
			set doOnce to 1		;Trigger is only set off one time
			endif 	

				if ( Button == 2 )
			Player.additem 00031944 3
			Player.additem 00033BC6 2		
			Player.additem 00029383 4
			Player.additem 0006B53E 150
			Set Disabled to 1
			set doOnce to 1		;Trigger is only set off one time	


            elseif ( Button == 0 )
	          ;Do nothing 

		
		endif

End

Begin OnCombatEnd

DLC04BWSentrybot1REF.ResetHealth

END

伊斯拉内格拉电器店钥匙

original: Our north camp was abandoned a few days ago due to the numerous amounts of attacks from the ghouls in the old cemetery. There are still a lot of supplies left there which we didn’t have time to bring back. A patrol was sent up to retrieve the items left but before they could even reach the camp they came into contact with more ghouls forcing them to retreat. Another patrol will be send to try and retrieve the supplies in a few days.
translation:
我们北营地几天前因为旧墓地里众多尸鬼的攻击而被遗弃。

那里还有很多我们没来得及带走的物资。我们派出一队巡逻兵去取回留下的物品，但在他们到达营地之前，又遇到了更多的尸鬼，迫使他们撤退。

过几天我们会再派一队巡逻兵去试着取回那些物资。

original: The "Biker Camp" just north east of here was constructed a few weeks back, it’s been useful for keeping eyes on the road and controlling the amount of ghouls coming from the swamp. There’s also a roadblock located near the camp which has proven helpful when hostiles have previously come from the south.
translation: 这里的东北方向，几周前建造了“贝克营地”，它有助于监视路况，并控制从沼泽地带过来的尸鬼数量。\n营地附近还设置了一个路障，当敌人从南方过来时，这个路障非常有用。

original: Recently we have decided to have some of our men set up a checkpoint on the bridge just south of here, it’s proving to be very useful so far. The men located at the bridge claim that they have prevented five ambushes so far and not one casualty. The camp is also situated near the hardware store so when supplies are low they can easily be replenished.
translation: 最近我们决定派一些人在桥南设立一个检查站，目前看来非常有用。\n\n驻守在桥上的人声称，到目前为止他们已经阻止了五次伏击，且没有任何伤亡。营地也位于五金店附近，因此当物资短缺时，他们可以轻松补充。

original: For now this camp will be serving as our headquarters. It’s surrounded by our other camps so it’s useful for keeping an eye on them. We have a checkpoint on the bridge which helps to remove any hostiles trying to get past, there are also few patrols up and down the road which help to prevent ambushes and attacks. So far we have had little resistance, however other camps seem to be the opposite and are frequently ambushed forcing us to abandon them. This has happened on about three occasions so far.
translation:
目前，这个营地将作为我们的总部。它被我们其他营地包围着，因此监视它们很有用。

我们在桥上设有一个检查站，有助于消除任何试图通过的敌人，路上也有几支巡逻队，有助于防止伏击和袭击。

到目前为止，我们遇到的阻力很小，但其他营地的情况则相反，他们经常被伏击，迫使我们放弃。这种情况已经发生了大约三次。

original:
Thanks for the help you gave me fighting off those bastards, I couldn't have done it without you. Now that they’re gone I'll be able to spread the word about this place and perhaps have some of my allies join me here.

If your ever in need of some supplies then be sure to come and see me, I'll have access to a lot more supplies once I've cleaned this place up and started trading.

I hope the 250 caps help, I'm sorry it’s not much but its all I have. 

Thanks again,

Karl.
translation:
谢谢你帮我打跑了那些混蛋，没有你我做不到。现在他们已经走了，我就可以四处宣传这个地方，或许可以让我一些盟友来这里。

如果你以后需要什么补给品，一定要来找我，等我清理完这个地方并开始交易后，我会拥有更多的补给品。

我希望这250枚瓶盖能帮到你，抱歉不多，但这已经是我所有的了。

再次感谢，

卡尔。

original:
Early yesterday one of the patrols came across a small camp on the south beach which seemed to be inhabited by at least one scavenger and some dogs. From the Intel received the camp could come in handy as it has two small shacks and is and is located close to the boardwalk. 

Supplies are very low, and because of this I have decided that the men move in quickly as we don't have the time to plan this operation. Unfortunately we don’t know for sure how many hostiles there are at the camp, I don’t have many men left so I can’t afford to lose any especially after our north camp was lost a while back. 

It's possible that there could be multiple hostiles at the camp, because of this I have sent a few men from each of the nearby camps to ambush once they have established just how many hostiles there are.
translation:
昨天早上，一支巡逻队在南滩发现了一个小营地，那里似乎至少住着一个拾荒者和几只狗。从情报中得知，这个营地可能会很有用，因为它有两间小棚屋，而且靠近栈道。

我们的物资十分紧缺，所以我决定让大家尽快行动，我们没有时间规划这次行动。

不幸的是，我们不确定营地里有多少敌人，我手头的人手也不多了，尤其是之前我们北边的营地失守之后，我更不能损失任何人了。

营地里可能有多个敌人，为此我已经从附近的营地派了几个人去埋伏，一旦他们确定敌人的数量，就会发起攻击。

original: The beach view camp near Calvert Mansion has been abandoned for a few weeks now due to the methane gas puddle that’s developed there. It seems that recently a few of the swamp creatures have inhabited it and can sometimes be seen dancing around the fire. The camp has become a real pain since they inhabited it as the main route to the mansion runs straight pass it, this normally results in the men being attacked causing injury and a lot of ammo being wasted. Even when the swamp creatures have been killed others seem to appear a few days later. For now I’ve stopped all the patrols going that way because supplies are low and I can’t afford to lose any more men.
translation:
卡尔弗特公馆附近的沙滩营地因为那里出现的甲烷气体水坑，已经被遗弃了几个星期。

最近，似乎有一些沼泽生物在那里定居，有时可以看到它们在火堆旁跳舞。自从它们定居以来，营地就成了真正的麻烦，因为通往庄园的主干道直接穿过那里，这通常会导致人们受到攻击，造成伤亡，并浪费大量弹药。

即使沼泽生物被杀死，几天后似乎又会出现其他生物。现在我已经停止了所有巡逻队前往那里的行动，因为物资短缺，我不能再损失更多人手了。

original: The amount of supplies in the armory has been decreasing for weeks now, nearly the entire medical and ammo supply has run out. Most of the weapons the patrols have been bringing in are either in bad condition or don’t work at all. \n\nSince the north camp was abandoned the patrols have found it difficult to try and retrieve the supplies because of the amount of ghouls that keep come from the cemetery. The only supplies we have coming in now are from the merchant across the river and one of the patrols every now and then. More men should be arriving in a few weeks with more supplies but if supplies here continue to decrease I’m not sure we’ll still be here by that time.
translation:
仓库的补给已经连续几周在减少了，几乎全部的药品和弹药都已经用完了。巡逻队带回来的大部分武器要么状况不佳，要么根本不能用。

自从北营被遗弃后，巡逻队就很难取回补给，因为墓地里的怪物太多了。现在我们唯一的补给来源就是河对面的商人和偶尔巡逻队带回来的。

几周后会有更多人和补给抵达，但如果这里的补给继续减少，我不敢保证到那时我们是否还在这儿。

original: Recover the dead Chinese spy's mission debriefing from the locker in Point Lookout.
translation: 从望海崖的储物柜中找到已死中国特务的任务简报。

original: Use the password holotape to access safety deposit box 1207 at the Point Lookout Bank.
translation: 使用密码全息录像带打开望海崖银行的1207号保险箱。

original: Search for clues about the fate of Agent Yang.
translation: 搜集关于特务杨婉任务的线索。

original: Investigate Agent Yang's fate at the Turtledove Detention Camp.
translation: 调查特务杨婉在斑鸠羁押营的最终下场。

original: Activate the Chinese submarine self-destruct protocol.
translation: 启动中国潜艇的自毁程序。

original: Return to the Motel Safehouse Terminal for further instruction.
translation: 回到汽车旅馆安全屋的终端处以获取进一步指示。

original: Use the Cryptochromatic Spectacles and Sequence Note to access the Spy Bunker.
translation: 使用加密光谱眼镜与记录的密码进入间谍地堡。

original: Investigate the spy at Motel Room 1G.
translation: 调查汽车旅馆1G号房间的特务。

original: Recover the dead Chinese spy's locker key from motel room 1G.
translation: 找到已死中国特务在汽车旅馆1G号房间的储物柜钥匙。

original: Listen to the Espionage Debriefing Holotape.
Recover the Cryptochromatic Spectacles from the Toilet Tank in Motel room 1D.
translation: 从汽车旅馆1D号房间的厕所水箱中找到加密光谱眼镜。

original: Seek the Spy's extraction details and payment in the spy bunker.
translation: 在特务地堡内搜寻特务撤离细则和给她的奖赏。

original: Confirm Submarine Self-Destruct by activating the Failsafe Lever.
translation: 使用安全解除控制杆启动潜艇自毁程序。

original: Get clear of the Submarine before it self-destructs!
Player is told about Punga and Riverboat
translation: 玩家被告知膨葛和渡轮

original: Player has agreed to search for Nadine
Player talks with Tobar about going to Point Lookout
translation: 玩家与托巴尔谈论前往望海崖

original: Player agrees to go to Point Lookout with Tobar
translation: 玩家同意与托巴尔一起前往望海崖

original: Player uses the bed in the boat - move boat to new world
translation: 玩家使用船上的床 - 将船移到新世界

original: Tobar welcomes you to Point Lookout
translation: 托巴尔欢迎您来到望海崖

original: Player arrives at the Mansion, gates close
translation: 玩家到达豪宅，大门关闭

original: Player has come to the Mansion, and heard he has to go inside
translation: 玩家来到豪宅，听说要进去

original: Post Onslaught, Desmond goes to talk to player
translation: 猛攻后，戴斯蒙德去和玩家交谈
肃清通往望海崖的路线。

original: Rest during the trip to Point Lookout.
translation: 在前往望海崖的旅途中休息一下。

original: Help the mansion's owner repel the invaders.
translation: 帮助公馆的主人击退入侵者。

original: Block off the breach upstairs in the West wing.
translation: 封锁西侧楼上的突破口。

original: Block off the breach in the East wing.
Fend off the last of the invaders.
Player agrees to the plan and receives info from Desmond
translation: 玩家同意计划并从德斯蒙德那里获取信息

original: Player reports to the Cathedral, is told about ritual
translation: 玩家向大教堂报告，被告知仪式

original: Player has acquired seeds from the Mother Pod
translation: 玩家从母舱中获取了种子

original: Player passes out and wakes up outside the bog, post-hallucinations
translation: 玩家昏倒后在大厅外的沼泽中醒来，出现幻觉

original: Player returns to Cathedral, is welcomed as member
translation: 玩家返回大教堂，作为成员受到欢迎

original: Investigate the Tribals at the Cathedral.
Collect seeds from the giant Punga plant.
translation: 从巨型膨葛果树上收集果实。

original: Talk with Desmond about his offer.
translation: 跟德斯蒙德谈谈他的提议。

original: Install the Cogwave Jammer on the Ferris Wheel.
translation: 把脑波干扰器安装到摩天轮上。

original: Install the Cogwave Jammer on the Ferris Wheel OR use the Trash Compactor to destroy it.
translation: 把脑波干扰器安装到摩天轮上或者使用垃圾压缩机摧毁它。

original: Use the Trash Compactor to destroy the Cogwave Jammer.
translation: 使用垃圾压缩机摧毁脑波干扰器。

original: Player discovers the locked robot door and is sent to locate the generator
translation: 玩家发现一扇被锁住的机器人门，并被要求找到发电机

original: Player discovered the generator. Needs to find the power source.
translation: 玩家找到了发电机。需要找到电源。

original: Player then checks the fuse box. Realizes it needs a new fuse. Goes and looks for one.
translation: 玩家检查保险丝盒。发现需要一个新的保险丝。去找一个。
玩家找到了新的保险丝。

original: Player fits the fuse to the board. Needs to turn the Generator on.
translation: 玩家将保险丝安装到电路板上。需要打开发电机。

original: Find and enable the generators power source.
translation: 找到并启用发电机的电源。
找到三个合适的保险丝。

original: Place the new fuses into the board.
translation: 将新保险丝放入电路板。

original: Locate the boardwalk systems power source
Player starts the quest by reading the terminal in the Smuggler shack and needs to travel to the Scavenger camp.
translation: 玩家通过阅读走私者小屋中的终端开始任务，并需要前往拾荒者营地。

original: The Player is instructed to kill the Smugglers attacking from the West.
translation: 玩家被指示杀死从西方进攻的走私者。

original: The Player is instructed to kill the Smugglers attacking from the East.
translation: 玩家被指示杀死从东方进攻的走私者。

original: The Player is instructed to travel to the Disaster Relief Outpost and kill the remaining Smuggler's.
translation: 玩家被指示前往救灾前哨站并杀死剩余的走私者。

original: The Player has failed the quest, probably by killing Karl Smithy.
translation: 玩家未能完成任务，可能是因为杀死了卡尔·史密斯。

original: All Smugglers have been killed, the quest is completed.
translation: 所有走私者都被消灭了，任务完成。

original: Fight off the Smugglers coming from Blackhall Manor.
translation: 击退来自布莱克霍尔庄园的走私者。

original: Fight off the Smugglers coming from Beach.
translation: 击退来自海滩的走私者。

original: Follow Karl and take out the remaining Smugglers at the Disaster Relief Outpost.
translation: 跟随卡尔，在救灾前哨站消灭剩余的走私者。

original: [Optional] Make sure Karl's dogs are kept alive.
Player discovered the Computer Terminal or attempted to open one of the motel doors starting this quest.
translation: 玩家发现了计算机终端或尝试打开汽车旅馆的门，开始这个任务

original: Player finds the necessary parts and repairs the generator.
translation: 玩家找到必要的零件并修理了发电机

original: Player needs to enable the power
Player enables the switch enabling the power, completing the quest
translation: 玩家启动开关以启动电源，完成任务

original: Locate the Motels secondary power source.
Turn on the secondary power source.
Locate the doors terminal and unlock the door.
translation: 找到门的终端并解锁门。

original: Player is told about Punga and Riverboat
translation: 玩家被告知膨葛和渡轮

original: Due to the highly irradiated waters throughout Point Lookout many dogs have become mutated and diseased. Despite this they still remain highly perceptive and aggressive.
translation: 由于望海崖一带水域遭受高度辐射污染，许多狗因此变异生病。尽管如此，它们依然保持着敏锐的感知力和强烈的攻击性。

original: Point Lookout is rumoured to be home to a unique creature called the Punga Scorpion, a unique variant of the Rad-Scorpion that shares similar characteristics to the Punga plant.
translation: 据传，望海崖上居住着一种名叫“膨葛蝎”的独特生物，这是辐射蝎的一个变种，其特征与膨葛植物颇为相似。

original: Since their discovery of Point Lookout, the number of Smugglers and their encampments has rapidly increased.
translation: 自从望海崖被发现以来，走私者及其营地的数量迅速增加。

original: Point Lookout once had one of the vastest underground systems in the Maryland, most of which are now overgrown or flooded.
translation: 望海崖曾是马里兰州最庞大的地下系统之一，如今大部分都已杂草丛生或被水淹没。

original: This Protectron is in bad condition, but it's most important parts are intact. A decent mechanic should be able to fix it.\n[1 Fission Battery, 1 Turpentine and 2 Tin Cans required]
translation: 这台保卫者机器人似乎状况不佳，许多部件都缺失了。但是它的关键部件完好无损。一名训练有素的机械师应该能够修好它。\n[需要1个核裂变电池, 1个松节油和2个锡罐]

original: [Repair 20] Salvage the Protectron for spare parts.
translation: [修理: 20]拆卸保卫者机器人以获取零件。

original: Externally this Protector looks fine, but it's internals reveal moderate damage. A skilled mechanic may be able to repair it however.\n[2 Fission batteries, 1 Conductor and 3 Tin Cans required]
translation: 从外表看，这个保卫者机器人看起来还好，但内部已受到中等程度的损坏。不过，熟练的机械师或许能够修复它。 \n[需要2个核裂变电池、1个导管和3个锡罐]

original: [Repair 20] Salvage the Protectron for spare parts.
translation: [修理: 20]拆卸保卫者机器人以获取零件。
你已经修理了保卫者机器人!

original: This door is locked tight, and the mechanism seems to be electronic. If it was supplied with power, you may be able to get it open.
translation: 这扇门锁得很紧，而且看起来是电子锁。如果给它供电，你可能会打开它。

original: The Sentry Bot has been permanently disabled.
The Protectron has been permanently disabled.
translation: 保卫者机器人已经永久瘫痪。

original: You have been granted access to the Ark & Dove Passage.
translation: 您已获得方舟与白鸽通道的准入权限。

original: This generator is responsible for supplying the boardwalk's lighting and security systems with power. Repairing the generator would enable the boardwalk's systems to work again.\n\nThis generator is responsible for supplying the boardwalk with power. Repairing it would allow the lighting and security systems to come back online.
translation: 这个发电机负责为栈道的照明和安全系统供电。修复这个发电机可以使栈道的系统重新工作。\n\n这个发电机负责为栈道供电。修复它可以使照明和安全系统重新上线。

original: This generator supplies power to the exterior lighting systems of the motel, however many parts are missing. Someone skilled enough could attempt to fix it.\n[Repair of 65, 3 Scrap Metal, 2 Fission Batteries, and 3 Tin Cans required]
translation: 这个发电机为汽车旅馆的外部照明系统供电，但许多部件丢失了。有足够技能的人可以尝试修复它。\n[需要65修理、3块废金属、2块核裂变电池和3个锡罐]

original: This generator is currently powering the Homestead Motel's lighting.
translation: 发电机目前正为如家汽车旅馆的照明供电。

original: This generator is fully functional, but lacks any energy.
translation: 这个发电机功能齐全，但缺乏能量。

original: This fusebox seems to be missing a few critical fuses. If you had some to repair it with, you could attempt to insert them in.
translation: 这个保险丝盒似乎缺少了一些关键的保险丝。如果你有保险丝来修理它，你可以试着把它们插进去。

original: Place the fuses into the board
translation: 请将这些保险丝放入电路板

original: You have fixed the generator, enabling power to the boardwalk's lighting and security systems.
translation: 您已修复发电机，使栈道照明和安保系统恢复供电。

original: This sewer lid appears to be welded shut.
translation: 这个下水道井盖似乎是焊死的。

original: This fuse is currently being used to power the boardwalk lighting. Removing the fuse would cut the power.
translation: 这个保险丝目前正用于给栈道照明供电。移除保险丝会切断电源。

original: This door is locked tight, and the mechanism seems to be electronic. If it was supplied with power, you may be able to get it open.
translation: 这扇门锁得很紧，而且看起来是电子锁。如果给它供电，你可能会打开它。

original: This door seems to be jammed from the other side.
translation: 这扇门似乎从另一侧卡住了。

original: This generator is currently powering the exterior lighting of the Homestead Motel.
translation: 这个发电机目前正为如家汽车旅馆的外部照明供电。

original: The door is powered but it seems to be activated elsewhere.
translation: 门是带电的，但似乎在其他地方被激活了。

original: The motels secondary lighting has been enabled. This includes the motels lower level lighting and the exterior lighting at night.
translation: 如家汽车旅馆的次要照明已启用，包括汽车旅馆低层照明和夜间外部照明

original: Point Lookout Reborn has been successfully installed and loaded to your game.
translation: 望海崖重生已成功安装并加载至你的游戏

original:
Point Lookout Reborn has detected you have already made progress in Point Lookout

It is highly recommended that you do not use Point Lookout Reborn from this save. Start a new game or load a previous save before you made any progress in the Point Lookout DLC.

This step It is not essential and will not stop this mod from working. However it will likely cause some instability when playing in Point Lookout and cause a lot of the additional content not to work. If you decide not to follow this instruction then do not report any errors found as they will likely be a result of not following this instruction.
translation:
望海崖重生检测到你在望海崖已经有所进展

强烈建议你不要从这个存档开始使用望海崖重生。在望海崖DLC 中取得任何进展之前，请开始一个新游戏或加载以前的存档。

此步骤不是必需的，也不会阻止此模组正常工作。但是，在望海崖游玩时可能会导致一些不稳定，并使许多额外内容无法工作。如果你决定不遵循此说明，请不要报告发现的任何错误，因为它们很可能是没有遵循此说明的结果。

original: This Sentry Bot appears to be in bad condition, with many missing or damaged parts. A highly trained mechanic should be able to fix it.\n[1 Conductor, 2 Scrap Metal, 2 Fission Batteries, and 1 Wonderglue required]
translation: 这台铁卫兵看起来状况很差，许多部件丢失且受损。训练有素的机械师应该能够修好它。\n[需要1个导管、2个废金属、2个核裂变电池和1个万能胶]

original: [Repair 25] Salvage the robot for spare parts.
You have repaired the sentry bot!
This Protectron appears to be beyond repair.
translation: 这个保卫者机器人似乎无法修复。
